record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2070
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2070 -- (House of Representatives - July 27, 2007)

[Page: H8789]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that Mr. Bartlett of Maryland be removed as a cosponsor of H.R. 2070. He was added by mistake.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Colorado?
